data.name: On My Own - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The Official Soundtrack for "On My Own" features all of the original music found in the game. Composer Cody Qualley meticulously crafted each track with a theme in mind to reflect the different biomes, and events in the game.
data.about_the_game: The Official Soundtrack for "On My Own" features all of the original music found in the game. Composer Cody Qualley meticulously crafted each track with a theme in mind to reflect the different biomes, and events in the game.
data.short_description: The Official Soundtrack for "On My Own" features all of the original music found in the game. Composer Cody Qualley meticulously crafted each track with a theme in mind to reflect the different biomes, and events in the game.
